title: Wyrling
description: The Wyrforra War is far from over!After losing their home, the Resistance has retreated to the woods, where they struggle to survive. Calla, a young soldier and the daughter of two Resistance heroes, will do anything to keep her family and her cause alive.When a mysterious young stranger appears in Camp, Calla must choose whether to stay in the safety of the forest or journey to a dangerous Wyrforra command center in the search of what she has lost.Meanwhile, the Wyrforra forces are stronger than ever. A new threat rises from within, determined to gain power and destroy humanity forever.
author: McKenna Miller
